Sludge/Artemis::

Artemis was around Jetv.

Sludge came in shouting "When sLudge will smash Decepticos?"


--- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers8@n... wrote:
> ::JetV/Repugnus/Crotale/Slag::
> 
> JetV sees Pacifix coming towards him.
> "Hey Pacifix, I think he is going to be ok, he is 25% repaired.  He
> can come with us maybe huh?"
> 
> Repugnus stumbled forward from the battle.  He got to the ship and
> seeing a fuel bar decided a couple drinks would not hurt as he went
> and drank some.
> 
> Crotale, still in the weapons room, heard the bots come back.
> 'Good the battle is over. Now maybe we can leave so I can stop
> hiding.' he thought to himself.
> 
> Slag ran towards the ship and his other Dinobots.
> "Haha...Battle be lost if Slag not there.  My hot slag won us 
battle.
> You do nothing chomp." he said to his leader Dinobot.
